data.eml:eml: A new genus of Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera: Ensifera: Tettigoniidae) from Central Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massa, Bruno (2014): A new genus of Phaneropterinae (Orthoptera: Ensifera: Tettigoniidae) from Central Africa. Zootaxa 3764 (2): 197-200, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.2.7
